info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 5 at 5:50AM CDT until April 5 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Paducah KY
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky...
South Fork Little River at Hopkinsville -68/80 affecting Christian County.
For the Little River...including Hopkinsville - 68/80, Hopkinsville - Bypass...elevated river levels are forecast.
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...South Fork Little River at Hopkinsville - 68/80.
* WHEN...From early this morning to late this afternoon.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 7.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 14.5 feet this morning. It will then fall to 3.6 feet tomorrow evening. It will rise to 6.3 feet late Tuesday morning. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. - Action stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO LATE THIS AFTERNOON
